text: Melinda Szikora (born 19 November 1988) is a Hungarian handball goalkeeper playing for Siófok KC. ==Achievements== *Hungarian Championship: **Gold Medallist: 2015 **Silver Medallist: 2014, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 *Hungarian Cup: **Gold Medallist: 2017 **Silver Medallist: 2014, 2015, 2019 **Bronze Medallist: 2011, 2016, 2018 ==References== ==External links== *Melinda Szikora career statistics at Worldhandball Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kiskunfélegyháza Category:Hungarian female handball players Category:Fehérvár KC players Category:Ferencvárosi TC players (women's handball)
title: Melinda Szikora
